author: Dan Cancian
title: NFL Records Two Coronavirus Cases on Same Day as Rams' Brian Allen, Chargers Staff Member Contract Virus
description: Allen is the first NFL player to test positive for COVID-19, but expects to be rid of the virus by the end of the week.
content:
Los Angeles Rams center Brian Allen is the first NFL player to test positive for coronavirus.
The 24-year-old told FOX Sports on Wednesday that he began showing symptoms of COVID-19 three weeks ago, noting he felt fatigued and suffered from headaches and a s… [+4143 chars]
